name: 🄵 🄰 🄲 🅃 🄾 🅁 🅈
description:
🄾 🄷  🄱 🄾 🅈 ! Today you are the one in charge on the Letters Factory, and apparently  a batch of their newest product just arrived: the LetterBlock! But don't worry, you only need to follow this two simple rules:

1. Check which LetterBlock are damaged with the keyboard, pressing the same keys as the ones you want to check.

2. If a LetterBlock is damaged it will turn red, so get rid of it aiming with your mouse.

---

CONTROLS

Keyboard (A to Z)

Mouse

---

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #57, with the theme "Factory".

Code and Art by @galbix
